item.title: Help with quests
item.dc:creator: @Unruling Unruling
item.description:
@Unruling wrote:

Why not use the base of the other quests?.

  • you’ll need to know how to do npc dialogues, ill try find a tut now,
    cant find one but they’re is one on the

Runeserver site , click RS2 Server - Tutorials and click the list of them, theres a quest one they’re mate, under deltascape hope this helps,
